title: Should your Pastor or Church Tell You How To Vote?
description:
I'll be doing a series of video in anticipation of the Synod of the Christian Reformed Church. One of the issues coming before Synod this year will involve how, when and whether the church gets involved in secular politics. 

The Agenda for the Synod of the CRCNA 2018 https://www.crcna.org/sites/default/files/2018_agenda.pdf 

Conversation with 4 CRC members about Overture 14 https://youtu.be/o6A2lye3mm4
